inn1.comm: starts short of a length outside off, Gayle rocks back and chops it behind point, wide of third man, for a couple
much better, decent pace too, 82.6 mph, fullish on middle and off, Gayle gets back and defends it cautiously into the off side
smashed! Overpitched outside off, a gift for Gayle who stands his ground and bludgeons it through extra cover for his first boundary, West Indies are away
Gayle shaped himself to dispatch that one over midwicket, realised the ball was a little too wide and slapped it wide of mid-off for another four, he's made his intentions clear
back of a length on the off, punched off the back foot to mid-off
and again, moved away, with the intention of playing the cut, but the ball was fuller than he expected, chopped it down to gully. Ends an eventful first over
teasing him outside off, full and juicy, Morton isn't tempted, lets  it go
presents the full face and drives it down to mid-off, nice crunching sound, confidently played
angling it into the pads, tries to clip it behind square but is struck on the thigh
gets on the front foot and drives straight to extra cover with a flourish but didn't time it well enough
good bouncer, Nehra bangs it in at 83.3 mph, Morton evades it at the last moment
moving into middle and off, gets across and pushes it towards midwicket, good over first up from Nehra, a maiden
slightly back of a length on the off, gets back and punches it to mid-off
Ishant hasn't had a good start to the series, short and wide, cut away fiercely on the bounce over point for a boundary
some shot that, took his right foot out, short and wide, similar delivery to the previous ball and pulled it away wristily, a slap in front of midwicket for another boundary
gets Gayle off strike, pushed off the front foot to  mid-off for a single
much better from Ishant, came back in sharply from outside off, struck him high on the pads as he came forward to play it back towards the bowler
slightly shorter this time, spat off the pitch and Morton dropped it down with soft hands in front of the bowler
Gayle doesn't spare Nehra either, short outside off, moves back and clatters it between extra cover and mid-off for four more
lands on a length, inviting him to drive, Gayle watchfully pushes it to cover this time
delicately done, moved slightly across when he saw the ball angling into middle and leg and flicked it gently past the keeper to the fine-leg boundary, subtle touches to match his blazing strokeplay
the break proves Gayle undoing! It was a hit-me ball, short and wide, Gayle went for his trademark cut but got a thick edge, probably due to a bit of extra bounce, straight to Dhoni, India strike.
back of a length outside off, chopped down to point off the back foot
almost chopped it on, there appeared to be no intent in that shot, just a lazy prod on the off side, takes the inside edge and just evades the leg stump
angling it in on middle and leg, clipped away off his pads wide of fine leg for a couple
full on the off stump, driven on the up to mid-off, firmly struck but straight to the fielder
good length just marginally outside off, opens the face to guide it behind point for a single
slightly short on middle, gets back and drops it back onto the pitch

short and wide, the extra bounce is working, Sarwan rocked back to cut that over point, got a thick edge that sailed over first slip to the boundary, went at it hard and that's what saved him in the end
excellent shot but some equally good fielding by Nayar at point, punched firmly off the back foot just wide of him but a dive saved a couple of runs there
down the leg side, got his direction a little wrong there, extracting good bounce from the wicket in friendly conditions
getting it to move away after landing on a teasing length outside off, Sarwan shoulders arms to that one
fullish outside off, tries to slap it through cover but makes no contact
slightly short on the off stump, dropped just short of point and sets off for a quick single
straying on the pads but got it to move into middle after pitching, Morton went for the flick through square leg but was struck low on the leg
good bowling from Nehra here, not giving him any room, pitching it short on middle, Morton, rather awkwardly, fends it off into the leg side
that was coming, handled the short ball well this time, banged in on middle, picked the length early and pulled it away into the gap between midwicket and square leg for a boundary
driven well off the front foot but straight to mid-on, ball's coming on quite nicely
mistimed a cut this time, got into position but just rolled his wrists over it and chopped it towards point
too straight, in fact it was sliding down, Sarwan tried to flick it fine, brushed his pads, and they sneak a leg bye
working up some good pace here Ishant, fired in at 83.8 mph, worked away wide of midwicket and completes an easy single
bowling it from wide of the crease this time, on middle, held its line, pushed back to the bowler
moving into middle and leg, pitching it up, tries to drive it past midwicket but gets a leading edge to extra cover, did well to ease the bottom-hand
slightly short on middle, came back in, tried to whip into into the leg side, got an inside edge into his rib cage
back of a length on the off, pushed straight to the close-in fielder on the off side, Morton hasn't taken off here

an ugly stroke that, a wild swing on the leg side and the ball wasn't just there to hit, got an inside edge onto his pads, not the most elegant batsman Morton, but his record shows he's been quite effective
pitched outside leg and he fails to connect a clip off his pads, manages two leg byes thanks to some lethargic fielding at midwicket
two more, crunched off the back foot wide of Harbhajan at mid-off who palms it off for another single
much closer to the stumps this time, defends it into the off side towards cover
poor ball and Sarwan was ruthless, made room to a short delivery and caned it over the covers for a boundary, he's got into his groove here
nicely done, waits for it, opens the face and glides it to third man for a single
another four-ball but Morton fails to take advantage, straying on the pads, should have been dispatched to the fine-leg boundary, rolls down to the keeper off his thighs
Morton is struggling here, and remember he averaged 127 before this match, short ball, Sarwan would have pulled it, but Morton gets an inside edge onto his pads
slower offcutter, perhaps the first variation seen by Ishant today, moved back in towards middle, defended into the leg side, calls for a single but is sent back
connects the pull this time, but not as well as he would have liked, an attempted bouncer by Ishant that is bunted wide of deep midwicket for a couple
good length outside off, gets across and defends it to point
good length on the off, dropped short of cover, decides against the single
landing on a good length on middle,turned away wide of midwicket for a single
..and he's shrugged off his rustiness, length ball on the pads, clears midwicket with a whip and to the boundary, good start
banged in short outside off, pulled away to deep midwicket, just a single
nicely done, rose upto him after landing on a good length outside off, countered it well, waiting for it, and guiding it away from the keeper the last moment for another boundary
flighted on the off stump, tries to turn it past midwicket, gets an inside edge onto his pads, rushes through for a single
slightly short on middle and leg, dropped into the leg side for a single
saw him charge forward and dropped it short, pushed away to midwicket
long hop on leg stump, pulled away to deep backward square leg for a single
pushed through quicker on the off stump, driven straight to extra cover
bowled flat from round the wicket on the off stump, defended wide of cover for an easy single
kept a little low, targeting the leg stump but pitched outside, pad first and then bat, they rush through for a single
back of a length outside off, opens the face to guide it wide of Ishant at third man for a couple
on middle and leg, turned away just short of midwicket for a quick single
appeal for lbw, was definitely hitting middle and leg as he went for a wild swing over square leg but it clearly pitched outside leg stump, so not out
beautiful shot, was not quite to the pitch there but presented the full face to drive it past the bowler, and wide of mid-on for three runs
short on the off, Sarwan has no trouble running it down to third man to keep the strike
slightly short on the off stump, worked away wide of square leg for one more
tossed up, really slow through the air, beat Morton in the flight as he came forward to nudge that for another single, struck him on the ribs
stumped, brilliantly done, beaten through the air again, saw him coming down and fired it short outside off, Morton made no contact and Dhoni did the rest, finding him miles short
employs the sweep immediately, low full toss on the off, played down to fine leg
targeting middle and leg, bowling with a flat trajectory, tucked away in front of square for a single
outside the off but not short enough for  cut, chopped down to point

appeal for lbw, oooh, looked close, the arm ball on middle and off, Sarwan gets forward to defend but is rapped on the pads, looked to go straight on but the umpire  might have thought it struck him outside the line, replays suggest that wasn't the case
short outside off, cut away to deep point for a single
fullish on middle and leg, goes for the reverse sweep but fails to connect, salvages a leg bye
quicker one on middle, tries to work it in front of square, gets an edge onto the pads
goes after it, tossed up on the off, makes room and skies it in the vacant gap between long-off and deep cover for a couple of runs
shapes up for a sweep but upon it landing short, adjusts well and pulls it to deep midwicket, but for just a single
latched onto it well, fired it short outside off, made room and slashed it behind point for three runs as deep cover runs to his left to cut that off
on the stumps this time, turned away behind square for a single
goes for the sweep for the umpteenth time, misses and is rapped on the pads, struck him outside the line
short of a length but fails to capitalise, this is a good tight over, chopped down to point
quicker through the air, short on the off, slapped down to long-on for a single
paddled down to deep backward square leg, the spinners are keeping it tight here
comes down the track and pushes it to midwicket, no run there
picks the gap this time, full on middle and leg, flicks it away, times it well wide of long-on and midwicket for a pressure-relieving boundary
four more, a lucky break here for Sarwan, flighted outside off, turns away to kiss the outside edge as he goes for a booming drive and beats short-third man to the boundary
slipped out of his hand, a beamer by a spinner, given a wide, went well over his head
flighted on the off, gets to the pitch and drills it straight to extra cover

that's dismissed, the momentum is back with the hosts, dropped it short on middle, long hop and Sarwan seizes the length early, rocking back and pulling it over the deep midwicket boundary for the first six of the innings, 16 off the over
flighed on the off, waits and bunts it down to deep cover
quicker one bowled flat and short on middle, mistimes a pull to deep square leg
Chanderpaul gets into the act now, flighted on middle, gets forward, bends low and sweeps it hard between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a boundary
rocks on the back foot and thumps it to deep cover for a single
the doosra, picked by Sarwan, who waited for it after it pitched on middle and off, opened the face to place it wide of short third for a couple more
on middle and leg, turned away behind square to reach his half-century, fluent innings and he continues to torment India once again in ODIs
short of a length on the off, goes for the cut but its too quick, beats the outside edge
saw it land short and immediately went for the pull but ended up getting a top-edge just short of short-third man
flighted on the off, converts it into a full toss and pushes it down to long-off
lots of empty spaces in the off side and he drops it short of point and sets off
rocks on the back foot and pulls it down to deep square leg, one more
poor fielding at point, Chanderpaul reverse-sweeps that well but straight to him but he's generous enough to allow it roll through his legs to the boundary, we'll let you know the culprit in a bit
starts off with a short one outside off, cut away behind point for a couple more
quickish on middle and leg, chipped down to long-on for a single

for a moment it seemed it would clear the ropes, swept it well to reach backward square leg but didn't time it as well as he would have liked, Nehra stood patiently, judged it well and ensured he didn't lose his balance once he had cupped it just inside the boundary, important breakthrough
straightish on middle, tickled behind square for a single
his wrists are in operation immediately, flicks it away uppishly, just short of midwicket
the ball stopped on him there but he did well to keep it down and play it back to the bowler with a straight bat
length outside off, pushed through straight to Yuvraj at extra cover
cramped him on middle and leg this time, tried to turn it fine but was hit high on the pads
full on the off, pushes it firmly wide of long-off but not enough on it to come back for the second
short on middle, tries to work it behind square, hits the pads and drops short of point, they steal a quick single
not a good idea to stray on the pads with the fine leg inside the circle but Sarwan, fortunately for RP, flicks it square for a couple
full on the off stump, gets to the pitch and strokes it down to long-off, one more
fired down the leg side, a wide
on middle and leg, gets a leading edge towards cover as he tries to drive it past midwicket
quick on leg stump, saw him come down but Sarwan dealt with it well, whipping it behind square for one more
thrown down the leg side but probably brushed his pad on the way to the keeper, hence the wide not given
pushed away off the front foot through midwicket for a single

run out, poor calling there, there was no second in it, worked away behind square and he turns back to run in for the second but a powerful throw from Gautam Gambhir beats his valiant dive, Dhoni has no trouble clipping the bails to end his impressive knock
quickish on middle and off, defended onto the pitch
on target, good length on middle and leg, pushed straight to midwicket off the front foot
fails to take advantage of a meaty ball on the leg stump, clips his pads and they steal a leg bye

superb shot, full on the off, in the slot and he pulls off the shot of the day, driving it over extra cover for a boundary, people have likened his technique to Lara, rather premature but he certainly reminds you of him
nice backlift and blocked confidently back to the bowler, slight shake of the shoulders before impact, nice
beaten this time, overpitched and went for the drive, with a flourish but didn't make contact
took his bottom-hand off as he dropped it into the leg side and scampered off
dropped off the front foot in front of Dhoni, wide of the pitch, and sets off for a quick single
gets on the back foot and punches it wide of cover for one more
comes down the track and taps it wide of midwicket for one more
quick on middle, spins in a touch, no room either for a cut, or for opening up, pushes it back to the bowler
erred in length slightly there, too full, flicked away behind square and came back quickly for the second but the umpire calls it one-short
on middle and leg, tickled to short fine for a single
a slog that pays off, a touch too short outside off, swings it away blindly into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on for a boundary
saw him make room and chased him, defended into the gap wide of cover for a single
swing and a miss, was eyeing the long-off boundary there, was in the slot, meaty outside off, but didn't connect
short on middle, chips it over the bowler's head, mistimed it completely as the bottom-hand came off and they run two as it lands safe in front of long-on
another chip, but a firmer one this time, gets to the long-on fielder on the bounce
brushes his pads as he fails to clip that fine, settles for a leg bye
tossed up outside off, some dreadful fielding at extra cover allows them to come back for the second, as he drives it through his legs
held it back this time, pulled away on the bounce to long-on
that's bludgeoned, the length was right as he came down the track and drilled it along the ground to beat long-off by a mile, powerfully struck
aah, that flourish, full on middle, length ball and smashes it over Yusuf's head for a one bounce four, gave that a good thump
mistimes an attempt to clear midwicket this time but gets a couple nevertheless
comes down the track and bunts it down the ground to midwicket for a single
timber! In the blockhole on middle, Darren makes room to swing that past midwicket but misses and the stumps take a beating!
slashed away to third man for a single
length ball and should have been dealt with, Bravo was in a good position to do so, giving himself room to clear extra cover but made no contact
full outside off, pushes it to extra cover along the ground for a single this time
nice tight line, targeting the blockhole, lands just short of the crease, squeezes it to extra cover for a single again
excellent catch by Dhoni, full and wide, goes hard at the drive, gets a thick edge and the Indian captain flings himself to his right to pluck that one-handed and see the back of Bravo
slow through the air, short outside off, cut away to deep cover for a single
falls safe, was the doosra, landed on a length and Taylor tried to smash that over midwicket, got a top-edge that landed just short of short fine leg
biggy,  gave it some air and Ramdin sensed a chance, charging down the track and clearing long-off with ease
Yusuf concedes a boundary, an ill-timed dive in the deep as Ramdin smashed that wide of cover and he palms it off to the ropes, how costly will his lapses prove?
down the track and pushed away wide of long-on for a single
well struck but straight down long-on's throat, short on the off, pulled away flat to Ishant who takes a sharp one

inn2.comm: beaten rightaway, got it to shape away from the batsman as he lunged forward to defend, a beauty first up
angling down leg this time, a touch short, Karthik fails to get a touch to it, a wide opens India's account
moving away again, there's a widish first slip, gets forward and drops it with soft hands towards gully
fullish on the off, pushed off the front foot to mid-on, where's the bouncer, the short one that's proved India's nemesis?
slightly short outside off, pushed off the back foot behind point for a quick single
back of a length on middle, tucked away in front of square leg for an easy single to get off the mark
latches on quickly, short ball on the off, rocks back and pulls it away over midwicket for India's first boundary, saw it well and dealt with it appropriately
full on the pads, doesn't get it away, clips the pads and drops on the pitch, is sent back after calling for the single, rightly so
well done, testing line outside off, trying to tempt him into the drive, Gambhir leaves it be
beaten, getting some good movement away from the batsman and bowling at a decent pace, 86.2 mph that one, Gambhir came forward and opted to guide it past the slips but was beaten by the pace
slightly short on the off, waits for it and taps it straight to gully, good start by Rampaul
edged and through slip and gully, short and wide and he slashes hard from the crease but the edge sails through the gap to third man
angling it into middle and leg, gets a leg bye as it brushes his pad and lands just wide of the pitch
sweetly struck, good confident drive between cover and mid-off, pitched up outside off and just a firm push takes it all the way to the ropes, beautifully timed
poor bowling, short and wide, slashes hard and cuts it one bounce wide of third man for successive boundaries
on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler, watchfully done
length ball, a slower one this time, outside off, chopped down to third man for a single
full toss on middle, whipped away to deep backward square leg for one more
tapped off the front foot just wide of point for a quick single to keep the strike
back of a length on the off, dropped off the back foot towards cover
drifting into middle and leg, worked away straight to midwicket from the crease
edged, deliberately done, just wide of first slip, short outside off and opened the face at the last moment to beat third man to the ropes, quite an enterprising player this lad
short on middle and leg, tries to whip it square, is struck on the thighs and scrambles a leg bye
bowls it short to Gambhir who rocks back and pulls it into the vacant gap between mid-on and midwicket, three runs, not very well timed but got the distance to come back for the third
appeal for lbw, bowled from wide of the crease and came back in to rap Karthik on the pads, in line with the stumps but a little too high as he tried to work that away off his legs
bouncer, or an attempted one, rightaway, short on leg stump, turned into the leg side and sets off, would have made it but a direct hit would have rendered it a close call, no damage done in the end
short on middle, turned away behind square for a single, kept a little low there but he got his bat down in time
back of a length on middle, guided down to third man for a single
swinging in, hit the bat hard, got an inside edge onto his shoe as he tried to push that back to the bowler

attacking shot, just a fraction short on the off stump and Karthik handles it superbly, gets on the front foot and pulls it hard past midwicket for a boundary, the short delivery hasn't ruffled him yet
sensible batting, punched off the back foot towards a slightly deepish mid-on for a single
on middle and leg, clips his thigh pad on the way to fine leg
pitched full, gave him the charge and went at it hard, got a thick edge towards third man, Karthik is leading the way here, Gambhir hasn't been in the best form this series
short on middle and leg, closes the face and places it between square leg and midwicket for one more

overthrows, Gambhir tapped it to point to give his dominant partner the strike and a needless throw at the striker's end by Dwayne Bravo ricocheted off the stumps to the boundary, gifting India some easy runs
short on middle, coming in slightly, defended into the leg side
swinging into middle and leg, turned away behind square for a single
short on the off, slapped gently towards mid-on for a single
back of a length on middle, too many short balls in his brief spell here, they shouldn't be overdoing this, dropped short of square leg for a single
good length on middle and leg, turned away to fine leg for a single
short of a length on middle, pulled along the ground to deep square leg for a single
produced the outside edge, spat off the pitch and moved away sharply but Karthik did well to play it with soft hands, down to third man for a single, bringing up the half-century partnership
made room to drive that through the covers but Bravo followed him, pushed it back to the bowler realising the shot wasn't on
short of a length outside off, kept low as he tried to run it to third man, got an inside edge that just narrowly missed the leg stump and rolled down to fine leg
missed out there, full outside off, drilled straight to extra cover, lots of power in that shot but no placement
good length on the off, dropped short of point for a single
missed stumping, down the leg side, Gambhir was out of is crease as he went for glance and Ramdin failed to latch onto it, India earn a slice of luck
Gambhir living dangerously here, full on leg stump, tried to clear midwicket but got the leading edge that landed well behind mid-on, they come back for the second
flicked away gracefully there but straight to the fine-leg fielder
dropped short outside leg stump, helped on its way to fine leg for a single

too many short deliveries bowled at these two, especially Karthik, and he has no trouble getting forward and using the free swing of the bat to clear the deep midwicket boundary, nice clatter once he made contact with that one
short on the off, they need to alter their lengths quickly here, pushed to point
much better, length ball on the off, comes down the track and drives it on the up to mid-on
full on the pads, flicked away to deep square leg for a single, a good return from the deep dashes any hopes of a second
Gambhir's doing the right thing, just rotating the strike, short on the leg stump, turned away to fine leg for the single
shortish on middle and leg, pulled to deep backward square
quickish on middle, didn't time it too well but found the gap, pulled it uppishly between long-on and deep midwicket for a couple
straying on the pads this time, pads it away to short fine
fired it short and wide, Karthik made room and slashed it wide of deep point for a single
tossed up on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
full toss outside off, Karthik attempts the reverse-paddle, misses
flighted outside off, gets forward and slices it to deep cover for a single
short on leg stump, turned to short fine, should have found the gap there
good strike but only for a couple, full on the off, charges down the track and plays it inside out wide of long-off
quickish on the off stump, dropped short of cover for a quick single
on middle and leg, worked away towards square leg, one more
on middle and off, opens the face to play it wide of point for a single
Gambhir settling in nicely now, tossed up outside off, danced down the track and plays the shot that he is so good at, lofting it over extra cover for a one bounce four, his first boundary
flighted on middle and leg, tickled wide of short fine for a quick single
tossed up on middle, swept away firmly down to deep square leg, another single
fullish on middle, worked away behind square, Darren Bravo takes a while running in from deep backward square leg and allows the batsmen to come back for the second
fraction short on middle, pulled away to deep square leg for a single to keep the strike, nice going

run out, Karthik is walking back, Gambhir played the cut, Rampaul took aim from point and threw down the stumps at the striker's end to beat Karthik's dive as he attempted to complete the single, there was a bit of hesitation in the middle and those precious micro-seconds of uncertainty cost him is wicket
he's into it immediately, sweeping this really fine wide of the short-fine fielder for a couple
and again, fullish outside off, opens the face to nudge it wide of short third man this time
three in a row, driven off the front foot wide of long-off for a couple more
tossed up on middle and leg, tries to push it past the bowler but gets an inside edge onto the pads
flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
tossed up outside off, driven firmly down to deep cover for a single
excellent fielding, Gambhir did it very delicately, tickling it really fine but Chanderpaul chased well to drag it back just inside the ropes
flighted on middle, drifting into the right hander, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, driven down to long-off for a single
quickish on the off stump, turned away to deep square leg for a single
full on middle and leg, Gambhir takes full toss, clipping it over midwicket for a boundary
short of a good length on the off, run down to third man for a single
pulled away with disdain, short, again short, on middle, Dhoni rocks back and dismisses it to the deep square-leg boundary
good length on the off, dropped awkwardly short of cover for a quick single
slower one bowled short outside off, tries to run it down, makes no contact
full on the off stump, driven down to long-on to keep the strike, 11 off the over
he's edged it! Slightly short on the off, spin in a touch, tried to turn it into the leg side, got a faint inside edge straight into Ramdin's gloves, crucial wicket
some bounce there, dropped his hands at the last moment, defended it into the leg side
flighted on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
slightly short outside off, kept low as he tried to cut, made no contact
tossed up on middle, flicks it away to deep backward square leg for a single
full toss on the off, bunts it down to long-off, excellent over by Benn, the pressure builds
full on the pads, flicked away gracefully between deep square leg and fine leg for a couple
down the leg side,a  slower ball gone wrong, gifts a run
length ball on middle, tries to crash it back past the bowler, mistimes it, lands on the bounce towards Bernard
full on the pads, whipped away to deep midwicket, firmly struck but just a single
slower one bowled short outside off, Yuvraj had to chase it, a marginal call that, given a wide, a little tough in the end
full outside off, opened the face to guide it behind point for a single
slower one bowled short on the off, punched down the ground to long-off, a single

Yuvraj has holed out! This is a massive blow. Full on middle and Yuvraj's eyes lit up, tried to clear long-on but didn't get the desired distance, Darren Bravo held his nerve in the deep to latch onto a pressure catch, West Indies are pulling it back
low full toss outside off, reverse paddles it for a single wide of short third
drifting into middle and leg, pushed away wide of square leg for a single
Dhoni clears his left foot and opens up, swinging a fullish delivery over midwicket for a crucial boundary, that'll ease the Indian nerves a bit
attempts the reverse-paddle again but fails to connect, dot ball, much quicker from Benn
fired it full this time, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
full toss on middle, pushed down to the ground to long-on
good length on middle, dropped into the leg side just wide of the pitch for a quick single
good shot, but good fielding as well in the deep by Morton, short and wide, cut away wide of deep point but a slide keeps them down to two
slower ball, converts it into a full toss and rams it down the ground to long-off
third man is up, and Rohit gently guides it to him for a single
length ball on middle, tries to clear midwicket, the shot was on but he ended up getting a thick inside edge wide of square leg for a well-run couple
full outside off, kept it on a length again but Dhoni didn't take the aerial route, instead grinding it to long-off for one more to keep the strike
full and wide, digs it out, gets a single wide of the keeper, and what's worse for West Indies, he's overstepped so a freehit coming
nope, jars it down the ground to long-off, was in the slot but he didn't strike it well enough
well bowled, in the blockhole, Dhoni can just steer it to point and race through for a single
full toss on middle and leg, poor ball under the circumstances, Rohit just works it behind square, well wide of Morton at deep square leg for three runs, Morton chased it but he has a weak arm
was that a catch? no, it just fell short, took it on the half-volley, Dhoni paddled it and it fell just short of Darren Bravo at short fine, but he certainly saved a few there
full outside off, eased wide of cover for a single
excellent bowling, except for the overstep, yorker outside off, dug out in front of extra cover for a single
appeal for stumping, slower legcutter, full outside off, Dhoni sensed a chance and rightly attempted to clear long-off, swung hard and missed, Ramdin took off the bails but Dhoni was well in
slower one but dragged really short, pulled away between deep square leg and deep midwicket for a couple
slower one, three in a row, short outside off, punched to extra cover right at the edge of the circle for a single
Rohit makes room and lofts that over the bowler's head, just wide of the sliding long-on fielder for a couple,Morton almost overran that, but not much damage done

he's skied that, length ball on middle, was the slower one again, tried to clear deep midwicket but mistimed it, Bernard ran in from deep midwicket and took it with little difficulty, are India throwing it away here?
dot ball, short on the off, pushed back to the bowler, doesn't get the single, this  could be going down to the last ball
angling it into the pads, tries to smash it over midwicket, brushes the pads and they take a leg bye
that's swung away into the stands!! Picked the slower one, it was bowled full outside off and the Indian captain connected superbly, dispatching it over deep midwicket
Dwayne Bravo fumbles in the deep, drilled down the ground to long-on and the blip allows them to come back for the second
slower one bowled short outside off, hangs his bat out, gets an inside edge behind square to tie the scores with two balls to go
short outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover and Dhoni makes it to seal the game
